data.name: Business Maximiser
data.description: This all-in-one lending account provides day-to-day transaction capability and funds for your business to take advantage of opportunities to grow.

features.additionalInfo: Variable Rate : A competitive variable rate, with interest paid on the outstanding balance, not the limit.
Flexible repayment : No fixed monthly repayments required.
Security : Secured against cash, or residential property.
24*7 access : You can access your Business Maximiser using a Business Visa Debit Card, Internet and Phone banking or in branch
There are no fixed rates available for Business Maximiser Loans.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Your business must be registered in Australia.

A business entity domiciled in Australia or an individual 18 years and above or strata corporation domiciled in Australia and requires the funding for business or investment purposes other than investment in residential property
